TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit IBidirectionalContainer`1<TValue>
generic <typename TValue> public interface class IBidirectionalContainer

summary.span: 支援正向和反向反覆運算之容器的介面。

span.span: Interface for a container that supports both forward and backward iteration.

summary.span: 實作雙向反覆運算的容器支援下列作業：呼叫 operator++ 往前移動一個位置，以及呼叫 operator-- 往後移動一個位置。

span.span: Containers that implement bidirectional iteration support the following operations: moving forward one position by calling operator++, and moving backward one position by calling operator--.
